limbo.translation[0].definitions[0].defi: a situation in which nothing happens or changes for a long period of time, and it is difficult to make decisions or know what to do, often because you are waiting for something else to happen first
limbo.translation[0].definitions[0].exam: I’m in limbo now until I know whether I’ve got the job.
the limbo of his eight years in jail
limbo.translation[1].definitions[0].defi: to be in an uncertain situation in which it is not clear what will happen next
limbo.translation[1].definitions[0].exam: Investors in the shares have been left in limbo since the market tailed off.
